title: Buster
description: Abandoned on a busy road just before Christmas, Buster the dog is lost amid the snow and bustle, wondering if anyone will take him in. Linda Jennings tells Buster's story with sensitivity, sympathy, and humor, and Catherine Walters' marvelous illustrations capture perfectly a dog's-eye view of life. A heartwarming Christmas fable, "Buster" reminds young readers that the holidays aren't for humans alone.
author: Linda M. Jennings
